document.full_text: a federal investigation has found serious problems with the worker identification program at u.s. ports that could compromise security, a u.s. senator from new jersey said on tuesday.
document.title: port id program may compromise security: senator
lines_and_colors: a federal investigation has found serious problems with the worker identification program at u.s. ports that could compromise security, a u.s. senator from new jersey said on tuesday.
